content.rendered:
We provide online training for below subjects. Training will be delivered by  faculties with real time  industry level experience.  We can provide a free demo upon the request.

Please forward your queries to support@dbaclass.com 

 

1. Oracle database administration 11g/12c

 

2. Oracle dataguard — coming soon

 

3. Oracle goldengate v11/v12

 

4.  Oracle real application cluster ( RAC) — coming soon

 

5. PL/SQL programming:  – coming soon

 

6. Unix shell scripting:  – coming soon

 

7. Complete backup and recovery(RMAN,HOT, COLD) – coming soon
